Name: assign_worker_to_task
Description: A binary variable indicating if a worker `w` is assigned to a task `tsk`.

Name: select_user_story_for_sprint
Description: A binary variable indicating if a user story `us` is selected for a sprint `sp`.

Name: select_feature_for_release
Description: A binary variable indicating if a feature `f` is included in a release plan `rep`.

Name: assign_team_to_sprint
Description: A binary variable indicating if a team `t` is assigned to work on sprint `sp`.

Name: sprint_start_date
Description: An integer variable representing the start day of a sprint (e.g., day number from project start).

Name: feature_priority_value
Description: An integer variable to set or adjust the priority level of a feature.

Name: worker_allocation_percentage
Description: A continuous variable for the percentage of a worker's capacity allocated to a sprint.

Name: budget_allocated_to_epic
Description: A continuous variable representing the amount of budget assigned to an epic `e`.

Name: task_sequence_order
Description: An integer variable that determines the order in which tasks are executed within a sprint.

Name: set_sprint_duration
Description: An integer variable deciding the duration in days for an upcoming sprint.

Name: choose_worker_for_role
Description: A binary variable indicating if worker `w` is chosen to perform role `r` in a team.

Name: form_team_with_worker
Description: A binary variable that decides if a worker `w` is part of a team `t`.
